page_content: Discusses the renewal of an educational cooperation agreement among four cantons in Switzerland.
Reports on COVID-19 infections in an asylum center in Selzach, Switzerland.
Summarizes various governmental updates and decisions for October 2020, primarily focused on COVID-19 measures.
Provides information on the regulations and guidelines for the use of public water sources in the Canton of Solothurn.
Provides tax forms and guidelines for associations, foundations, and other legal entities for the year 2020.
Announces a new webshop for ordering fishing permits online and provides PDF guides for registration and obtaining the permits.
Discusses financial contributions for child care for state employees in the Canton of Solothurn.
